name: coding-interview-platform
description: Online Coding Interview Platform - Full Stack Application

scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && pytest -m 'not integration and not e2e'
scripts.test:backend:all: concurrently -n "Server,Tests" -c "yellow,green" "npm run backend:dev" "sleep 3 && cd backend && pytest"
scripts.install: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && pip install -r tests/requirements-test.txt
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + || true && find . -type f -name '*.pyc' -delete || true
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && black app tests || echo 'Install black: pip install black'
scripts.format:frontend: cd interview-platform && npm run format || echo 'No format script'
